text:
Quizlet | Leads, Architects, Engineers | Frontend tech lead | San Francisco | Onsite

Quizlet is popular, profitable and growing learning tech company used by more than half of US high school and college students. To expand globally we're growing our Web Infrastructure team to reinvest in performance and architecture.

There are many positions open: https://quizlet.com/jobs

A critical role I am hiring for is a Frontend architect: https://grnh.se/e461cb471 Fun role for anyone who loves making use of the latest Web technologies and tools.
